0000111010110000 1010100001000110 0 -> sum: 1011011011110110, cout: 0
0001100001000001 0100000101001011 1 -> sum: 0101100110001101, cout: 0
1110000000101110 0001110100000000 0 -> sum: 1111110100101110, cout: 0
0111001001110000 0000100011110110 1 -> sum: 0111101101100111, cout: 0
0110110111110010 1011011001100111 0 -> sum: 0010010001011001, cout: 1
1000001010110110 1110000101010000 1 -> sum: 0110010000000111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
